theRepent:SpreadingInfection.NAME: Spreading Infection
theRepent:SpreadingInfection.DESCRIPTION: Apply therepent:infection equal to therepent:bleed decay when therepent:bleed therepent:triggers for one turn.
theRepent:SpreadingInfection.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply therepent:infection equal to therepent:bleed decay when therepent:bleed therepent:triggers for !M! turns.

theRepent:Stigmata.NAME: Stigmata
theRepent:Stigmata.DESCRIPTION: You gain virtue for every hp lost.
theRepent:Stigmata.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: You gain virtue for every hp lost. NL innate.

theRepent:BladeOfRuin.NAME: Blade of Ruin
theRepent:BladeOfRuin.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !theRepent:SecondMagic! therepent:bleed and !M! therepent:acid, poison and therepent:infection.

theRepent:Purification.NAME: Purification
theRepent:Purification.DESCRIPTION: You may exhaust cards from your hand by spending !M! therepent:virtue. NL For each card exhausted this way gain !B! block.

theRepent:Virulence.NAME: Virulence
theRepent:Virulence.DESCRIPTION: Reduce therepent:infection by half. NL Apply that much therepent:infection to all other enemies.
theRepent:Virulence.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Reduce therepent:infection by half. NL Apply that much therepent:infection to all other enemies. NL Apply !M! therepent:infection to target.

theRepent:ParalyticPoison.NAME: Paralytic Poison
theRepent:ParalyticPoison.DESCRIPTION: Modify poison with !M! therepent:paralytic_poison. NL Exhaust.
theRepent:ParalyticPoison.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Modify poison with !M! therepent:paralytic_poison. Then apply !theRepent:SecondMagic! more poison. Exhausts.

theRepent:StoicWill.NAME: Stoic Will
theRepent:StoicWill.DESCRIPTION: Discard all status effects in hand. NL Draw a card for each status effect discarded this way.
theRepent:StoicWill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Discard all status effects in hand. NL Draw a card for each status effect discarded this way. NL draw a card.

theRepent:CausticAcid.NAME: Caustic Acid
theRepent:CausticAcid.DESCRIPTION: therepent:modify therepent:acid - target will take !M! hp damage from each excess therepent:acid not spent on damaging block, and increase therepent:acid decay by !M! per turn. NL Exhaust.

theRepent:QuickenDeath.NAME: Quicken Death
theRepent:QuickenDeath.DESCRIPTION: therepent:trigger therepent:bleed, therepent:acid, therepent:redemption, and poison !M! times. NL Consume therepent:bleed, therepent:acid and poison. NL Exhaust.

theRepent:SerratedEdge.NAME: Serrated Edge
theRepent:SerratedEdge.DESCRIPTION: Apply therepent:bleed equal to third of unblocked attack damage.
theRepent:SerratedEdge.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply therepent:bleed equal to third of unblocked attack damage. innate.

theRepent:BloodDetonation.NAME: Blood Detonation
theRepent:BloodDetonation.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to half therepent:bleed. NL Consume half of therepent:bleed.
theRepent:BloodDetonation.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deal damage equal to half therepent:bleed. NL Consume half of therepent:bleed.

theRepent:NeedleStorm.NAME: Needle Storm
theRepent:NeedleStorm.DESCRIPTION: Deal 1 therepent:piercing damage !M! times to a random enemy. NL Exhaust.

theRepent:ArterialBleeding.NAME: Arterial Bleeding
theRepent:ArterialBleeding.DESCRIPTION: therepent:modify therepent:bleed - therepent:bleed decay of a target is converted to therepent:bleed growth for !M! turns. NL Exhaust.

theRepent:SaintsProtection.NAME: Saints Protection
theRepent:SaintsProtection.DESCRIPTION: Convert all your therepent:virtue to temporary hp. Exhausts.

theRepent:Repentance.NAME: Repentance
theRepent:Repentance.DESCRIPTION: Convert all therepent:sin on yourself to therepent:virtue.

theRepent:CarrySins.NAME: Carry Sins
theRepent:CarrySins.DESCRIPTION: Transfer all targets therepent:sin to you, and apply to it therepent:redemption equal to half the sin transferred (rounded up).
theRepent:CarrySins.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Transfer all targets therepent:sin to you, and apply to it therepent:redemption equal to half the sin transferred (rounded up). retain.

theRepent:DipVenom.NAME: Dip in Venom
theRepent:DipVenom.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! therepent:envenom until the end of this turn.

theRepent:Mercy.NAME: Mercy
theRepent:Mercy.DESCRIPTION: Each time you heal another, gain half of the therepent:effective_heal amount (rounded down) as therepent:virtue.
theRepent:Mercy.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Each time you heal another, gain half of the therepent:effective_heal amount (rounded down) as therepent:virtue. retain.

theRepent:Trespass.NAME: Trespass
theRepent:Trespass.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! block. When damage is blocked this turn, apply therepent:sin equal to half damage blocked back to the attacker (rounded down).

theRepent:WeepingShadows.NAME: Weeping Shadows
theRepent:WeepingShadows.DESCRIPTION: Each time you apply a debuff gain !M! block.

theRepent:Infect.NAME: Infect
theRepent:Infect.DESCRIPTION: Convert third (rounded up) of targets therepent:bleed to therepent:infection.

theRepent:Pinprick.NAME: Pinprick
theRepent:Pinprick.DESCRIPTION: Deal 1 therepent:piercing damage. NL apply !M! therepent:bleed if target was poisoned. NL apply !theRepent:SecondMagic! poison if target was therepent:bleeding.

theRepent:DrawDarts.NAME: Draw Darts
theRepent:DrawDarts.DESCRIPTION: Add !M! dart cards to hand. NL draw one card.

theRepent:MedicalPoisoning.NAME: Medical Poisoning
theRepent:MedicalPoisoning.DESCRIPTION: Heal target for !M! hp. NL apply !theRepent:SecondMagic! poison.
